meanings.definition: Having or showing knowledge or understanding
meanings.sent1: She is an informed student who always knows the answers in class.
meanings.sent2: The informed decision was made after careful consideration of all the facts.
meanings.sent3: The informed cat knew exactly where the treats were hidden.
meanings.sent4: His informed opinion on the matter shed light on the situation.
meanings.sent5: The informed detective quickly solved the mystery with ease.

meanings.sent1: The informed customer was aware of the upcoming sale.
meanings.sent2: Being informed about the weather helped them plan their outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The informed squirrel knew where all the best acorns were hidden.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an informed traveler with all the brochures in hand.
meanings.sent5: The informed decision to bring an umbrella saved them from getting wet in the rain.
